${ModID}:StylePoints.NAME: Style Points
${ModID}:StylePoints.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Remove your Weak. NL Add a random card from your hat's Pack into your hand.

${ModID}:LetsPlay8Ball.NAME: Let's Play 8 Ball!
${ModID}:LetsPlay8Ball.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle an *8 *Ball into your draw pile.
${ModID}:LetsPlay8Ball.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Shuffle a *9 *Ball into your draw pile.

${ModID}:ZaHando.NAME: Za Hando
${ModID}:ZaHando.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust the middle card(s) of your hand.

${ModID}:LetsDraft.NAME: Let's Draft!
${ModID}:LetsDraft.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Choose a card. Shuffle a copy of it into your draw pile.

${ModID}:Beacon.NAME: Beacon
${ModID}:Beacon.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Startup: Add a *Safety into your hand.

${ModID}:SleeveUp.NAME: Sleeve Up
${ModID}:SleeveUp.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL When this appears in a card reward, the cards are *Foil and gain Retain.
